nodes.text: Star Wars in Pictures: The Original Trilogy

Star Wars in Pictures: The Original Trilogy is a canon young readers book written by Ryder Windham and illustrated by Brian Rood that was published in Australia on August 1, 2015. It retells the stories of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, and Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi with illustrations detailing scenes from the films. The book is intended for children ages 6–9. The book was republished by Egmont UK Ltd on November 5, 2015 as Star Wars Treasury: The Original Trilogy.

The greatest galactic saga of all time - in pictures! Celebrate the epic stories of the original Star Wars trilogy - A New Hope, Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi - in this spectacular illustrated edition. Featuring the glorious artwork of revered Star Wars illustrator Brian Rood and authored by New York Times best-selling author Ryder Windham, this stunning, special book is a must-have for fans old and new.
